title: You Asked and LaLa & Randall Answered - Love & Marriage and Co-parenting & Babies
description:
You asked, and Lala & Randall are answering! That's right, La & Rand are ripping through voicemails and taking questions about the first time they met, their first kiss, their engagement, co-parenting, and whether they'll have kids (and all of you have been invited to weigh in on that one)! Plus, they talk movie making, LaLa's cosmetics line, and they answer the most popular inquiry, "does Randall always talk this much?!"

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
